text: @TrumpWarRoom @maddow If the Western could have trusted China and Coronavirus earlier, everything would be much better. You bullied and mocked on China and Asians. And then you are paying your lives to learn this lesson. If Trump can't cooperate with China from now on, the US will be the next Italy.

entity.name: Updates on COVID-19 in Australia
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with information and advice from the prime minister, state and federal governments, health authorities and other trusted sources from around Australia. For more, visit https://www.health.gov.au/.
